thread.title: Ballard Named to D3hoops.com All-Region Second Team
thread.title_full: Ballard Named to D3hoops.com All-Region Second Team

author: Via California Lutheran University
title: Ballard Named to D3hoops.com All-Region Second Team
text:
Ballard Named to D3hoops.com All-Region Second Team
Ian Skrinde Alline Ballard was named to the D3hoops.com All-Region 10 Second Team, as announced on Monday. The sophomore forward adds another accolade to the shelf alongside two First Team All-SCIAC selections and the 2024 SCIAC Newcomer of the Year Award. Ballard ranked 16th in the country in rebounding with 11.9 boards per game and posted 14 double-doubles, helping lead the Regals to their first SCIAC Tournament Championship and NCAA Championship appearance since 2013. Ballard was one of three SCIAC representatives on the All-Region 10 teams alongside Whittier’s Rhe Nae Leach and Redlands’ AJ Wick. #21 Alline Ballard F 6′…
Read more at California Lutheran University
